General.Name: Borges Agricultural & Industrial Nuts S.A.
General.Description: Borges Agricultural & Industrial Nuts, S.A. engages in the production, processing, and B2B trade of dry nuts and dried fruits in Spain and internationally. It offers almonds, walnuts, pistachios, hazelnuts, dates and tiger nuts, prunes, dried apricots, raisins, dates, figs, sunflower pips, coconut, etc. The company was founded in 1896 and is based in Reus, Spain. Borges Agricultural & Industrial Nuts, S.A. is a subsidiary of Borges International Group S.L.U.
